sentence.Network_en: The usual whisperings among the lawyers and gathering together of papers followed.
sentence.Network_cn: 接着,就听见律师们惯例式地低头接耳和收拾文件的声音.

sentence.Network_en: The voices had toned away to mere whisperings.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们的说话声渐渐低下去,成了耳语.

sentence.Network_en: A rude noise broke on these fine ripplings and whisperings, so far away and so clear.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种粗重的声音, 遥远而清晰,打破了这委婉的汩汩声和低语般的喃喃声.

list.abs: Salt and... ... What a Friend We Have in Jesus 耶稣恩友 Whispering Hope 微声盼望 You Are My All in All 你是我一切的一切.
孤独达人！ - Bruce - 网易博客 ... Blow in the Wind《 随风而逝》 Careless Whisper《 无心快语》 Casablanca《 卡萨布兰卡》.
还有鬼语者(Ghost Whisperer) ，从小就拥有与鬼魂沟通的神秘力量，促使她进行一些超自然的调查。。。。配乐不错，有种神秘感， …
